item.title: A LCC YEAR IN REVIEW 2022 [LLwTT - EP07] [The Liberty Lounge with Tim Tysoe]
item.description:
Liberty Lounge with Tim Tysoe ~ HOLIDAY 2022 SPECIAL

Host Tim Tysoe is joined in the Lounge by the usual suspects Dr. Michael Thiessen, Andrew DeBartolo, and Matthew Hallick to take a look back upon the year that was (2022) and to look forward to the year to come.

Help us reach our fundraising goals for 2023: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/donate/

LCC wishes our audience a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year! Thanks you for your continued support! May God richly bless you and yours!

item.title: The Political Philosophy of Pierre Eliott Trudeau [The Liberty Lounge with Tim Tysoe]
item.description:
On this episode, host Tim Tysoe is joined in the Liberty Lounge by the President of the Liberty Coalition Canada, Dr. Michael Thiessen, to talk about the lasting influence that the political philosophy of Pierre Eliott Trudeau has had on Canadian politics. Let's just say Canada didn't get to where we are now overnight.

 

Episode Resources: The Essential Trudeau by Ron Graham: https://www.amazon.com/Essential-Trudeau-Pierre/dp/0771085915;

WATCH THIS EPISODE  ON RUMBLE HERE: https://rumble.com/v1izilj-the-political-philosophy-of-pierre-eliott-trudeau.html

item.title: Happy Birthday North America...It’s Time to Fight for Freedom...Again [The Liberty Lounge with Tim Tysoe]
item.description:
WELCOME TO THE LOUNGE! 

Host Tim Tysoe welcomes guests Michael Thiessen, Matthew Hallick, and Andrew DeBartolo to discuss the culture wars at home and abroad. The boys answer the question: Why is it necessary for Christians and conservatives to fight the necessary cultural battles, rather than burying our heads in the sand?

Episode Resources: Liberty Dispatch Episode - Good-bye Roe w/James Kitchen, Samuel Sey, Tabitha Ewert

Sick of Mainstream Media Lies?

Please Support us in bringing you real, truthful reporting and analysis from a Christian perspective.  Subscribe to our various shows:
